message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $100?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still thinking $90 is a good price for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I've made some concessions already, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $95. That's my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I understand you're trying to make a sale, but I'm not willing to pay more than $90. I think that's a fair price for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I've already told you, Bob, I won't go any lower than $95. You're not getting it for $90. My price is firm at $95. Take it or leave it!
I understand you're firm at $95, but I'm still trying to be reasonable. How about we meet at $92.50? I think that's a fair price for the product.
